name: HEAVEN by Clear eyes x Reo Cragun

metadata.description:
Sometimes we have to face our darkest thoughts before we can really move beyond them. We did that together with HEAVEN - Reo and I made this song right after we finished his Diary of a Loner album…we were locked in and had been creating together regularly for nearly a full year and were both itching to try something different. I sent him an instrumental inspired by acoustic singer-songwriters and he replied with the start of this heartwrenching song that soon revealed itself as one of the most vulnerable either of us had ever made. 
 
Reo and I bonded over the traumatic health issues and subsequent surgeries we both went through during the pandemic that seriously limited us for too long. Heaven looks that feeling of hopelessness we both felt straight in the eyes and in the end finds a glimmer of hope in it. Hope that we both found with each other as we deepened our creative partnership during that time. We’ve never heard anything quite like it.

This is song 1 from CACOPHONY, a new project from Reo Cragun and myself. CACOPHONY is a beautiful explosion. Deafeningly loud and chaotic and intimate at the same time. And it begins now.

lyrics.text:
Spending my last little coins that I saved on a red eye home
I showed up with a whole damn crew but now I walk alone
It make you feel small don’t it
Whole lotta pride to swallow
How do I explain that I have failed?
I spent years on this
But I can’t get em back, I want em back,  
I sure do.
I sure do.

They say that heaven is a place on earth.

Look at how the 5-0 treat us
Like we don’t mean nothin
Fuck around and end up on a T-shirt
and Channel 5 television
Only time we pray is when I need ya
But I don’t need ya
Fuck it I’mma end up where I belong 
Where I deserve…

Let it all unfold
Let it go where the wind blows..
Hmmm
They say that heaven is a place on earth.

Sometimes i feel like
Everything will work out
Exactly how it’s supposed to

When will it be alright?
When will it be alright?
When will it be alright, please, 
let me know, let me know, let me know, let me know
When will it be alright?

They say that heaven is a place on earth.

metadata.name: HEAVEN (with Reo Cragun) #1
metadata.title: HEAVEN (with Reo Cragun)
